pci_database_password_description: A password is required to connect to your cluster
pci_database_password_help: Your password must contain at least 2 numbers, contain between 8 and 32 characters, and all characters must be alpha-numeric.
pci_database_password_help_strength: Your password is not strong enough
pci_database_password_help_alphanumeric: Must be made up of letters and numbers (A-Z, a-z, 0-9)
pci_database_password_help_upper_case: Must contain at least one upper-case letter
